channel.title: Spawning costing money?
channel.description: I'm attempting to make a command that will spawn, for example, 1k vengance runes. The problem with this is I don't want to make it free. I would like it to require a certain amount of coins to spawn it. I don't have enough experience to know how to code this. Could someone help me out? By the way, its a delta source.

item.title: Spawning costing money?
item.dc:creator: @TheYoungBlood TheYoungBlood
item.description:
@TheYoungBlood wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:404377”]if(command.startsWith("barragerunes")) { if (playerHasItem(995, 100000)) { addItem(555, 6000); addItem(560, 4000); addItem(565, 2000); deleteItem(995, 100000); } else { sM("You need 100k to spawn barrage runes"); } }?[/quote]

Thanks man! This worked perfectly.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning costing money?
item.dc:creator: @TheYoungBlood TheYoungBlood
item.description:
@TheYoungBlood wrote:

It didn’t check for 100k , Does anyone know how this is done? I could really use this :\

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning costing money?
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“barragerunes”) {
addItem(555, 6000);
addItem(560, 4000);
addItem(565, 2000);
deleteItem(995, 100000);
} else {
sM(“You need 100k to spawn barrage runes”);

}[/code]

I’m not sure if this will actually check if you have 100k though, try it out

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning costing money?
item.dc:creator: @TheYoungBlood TheYoungBlood
item.description:
@TheYoungBlood wrote:

There currently is no code, this is why im asking help for. Ill write on as an exaple,

if(command.startsWith("barragerunes") { addItem(555, 6000); addItem(560, 4000); addItem(565, 2000); }
I would like this command to remove, lets say, 100k from your inventory. And if you don’t have 100k, then it will not spawn anything. Could anyone help me with this?

Read full topic
